channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MO

item.title: Report X-2024031424
item.description:
Report X-2024031424

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-01T03:13:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-22
  • City: EARTH CITY
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THE HAZ-MAT WAS FOUND TO BE LEAKING AT 19:10, ON THE SD-6 LOADING DOCK BELT, OF THE EARTH CITY, MO UPS HUB. THE PACKAGE A 12X12X12 IN DOUBLE WALL FIBERBOARD BOX. THE BOX AND SPILLAGE WAS CLEANED, CONTAINED, AND TRANSPORTED TO THE DMP PROCESSING AREA. AN INTERNAL INSPAECTION REVEALED NO PACKING MATERIAL TO PROTECT THE INNER RECEPTACLES (1 GALLON PLASTIC BOTTLES) DURING THE SHIPPING PROCESS. ONE OF THE BOTTLES WAS SEVERLY DENTED ON THE BOTTOM CAUSING THE CAP TO COME LOOSE. ALL MATERIAL HAS BEEN PROCESSED THROUGH THE UPS DAMAGED MATERIALS PROGRAM.

item.title: Report X-2024031346
item.description:
Report X-2024031346

  • City: KANSAS CITY
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: steel drum was found leaking in a plastic bag. It was taken back to the cage for inspection. Upon inspecting the drum it was noted that there were several dents in the lid DescribePack: dents in the top of the drum DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: the package was put in a plastic lined tote and placed into the hazmat cage

item.description:
Report X-2024031347

  • City: SAINT PETERS

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: radio call from Load side about leaking hazmat. upon inspection discoved leaking white powder coming from a hole at the bottom of the box. DescribePack: not clear where the leak was coming from on the bucket but noticed some damage to plastic bucket near bottom where it was leaking from the hole in the bottom of box DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in Haz tote and Brought to QA damaged Hazmat area for processing.

item.title: Report X-2024031333
item.description:
Report X-2024031333

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-29T18:14:08+00:00

  • City: BIRMINGHAM
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Improper package handling the jerrican was elevated instead of being on the floor and was pushed off by other packages on the rollers. DescribePack: Impact forced the cap to fail allowing contents to spill. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Timely placement in tote and absorbent place to contain liquid.

item.title: Report X-2024031273
item.description:
Report X-2024031273

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-29T18:14:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-21
  • City: ROLLA
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: While unloading a trailer a box was taken off and it was wet on the top half of the box. The box was segregated and taken QA for processing. DescribePack: The package had 4 inner bottles and 2 of them had loose caps therefore; the bottles leaked out into the box. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: The box was placed inside a tote and segregated from other packages.
